The cost of parking increases with the length of stay in the lot.

12. Explain fully the circumstances of a: Universal Theme Park maintains a program called "High Five, which is designed to recognize employees' outstanding contributions to the Park. "High Five" awards may be in the form of $5 vouchers redeemable for goods or services at the park, in the form of gift certificates, or in the form of raffle tickets which, if randomly selected, may be redeemed for various prizes of varying value. Five-dollar vouchers are distributed with some frequency to union-represented and non-union represented employees. Employee Perk Holiday: On a seasonal basis, the Park's community service department arranges special events for employees, whether union represented or not. In 2010, employees received a turkey, a pumpkin pie, a bag, a gift card, and family pass to the park in celebration of the Winter holidays.

12. Explain fully the circumstances of a: NBC Universal purchased advertising space in Editors Guild Magazine on six occasions in 2010. Editors Guild Magazine is published by IATSE 700 and payments made for advertising are made directly to the union. It is customary in the entertainment industry for media companies to place advertisements in union publications.

11.c. Kind of each payment or expenditur: Advertising in Editors Guild Magazine
Advertising in Local 728 Lighting Directory
Explain fully the circumstances of all p: NBCUniversal purchases advertising space in Local 728 Lighting directory. The Lighting Directory is published by IATSE Local 728 and payments for advertising are made directly to the union. It is customary in the entertainment industry for media companies to place advertisements in union publications.

11.c. Kind of each payment or expenditur: Advertising in Costume Designer Magazine Advertising in Costume Designer Magazine 10 Tickets to the Costume Designers Guild Awards Advertising in Costume Designer Magazine Advertising in Costume Designer Magazine
12. Explain fully the circumstances of a: NBC Universal purchased advertising space in Costume Designer Magazine on five occasions in 2010. Costume Designer Magazine is published by IATSE 892 and payments made for advertising are made directly to the union. It is customary in the entertainment industry for media companies to place advertisements in union publications. In 2010, Universal Studios purchased 10 tickets for the 12th Annual Costume Designers Guild Awards. The Costume Designers Guild (IATSE Local 892) organizes this annual event to honor costume designers for outstanding contributions in the previous year. IATSE Local 892 requires that payment for tables at the ceremony be made directly to the union. It is customary in the motion picture industry for studios to purchase tables for such award ceremonies.

11.c. Kind of each payment or expenditur: Advertising in Costume Designer Magazine

12. Explain fully the circumstances of a: In 2010, Universal Studios purchased 12 tickets for the annual Directors Guild of America Awards. The DGA organizes this annual motion picture/television awards show to honor its members who have performed with distinction in the previous year. The DGA requires that payment for tickets to the ceremony be made directly to the union. It is customary in the motion picture industry for studios to purchase tickets for motion picture award ceremonies. NBC Universal purchased advertising space in DGA Quarterly Magazine or on DGAQuarterly.org on nine occasions in 2010. DGA Quarterly is published by the Directors Guild of America and payments made for advertising are made directly to the union. It is customary in the entertainment industry for media companies to place advertisements in union publications and/or on the corresponding website.

NBC Universal purchased advertising space in the Local 80 Grip Newsletter on twelve occasions in 2010. The newsletter is published by IATSE Local 80 and payments made for advertising are made directly to the union. It is customary in the entertainment industry for media companies to place advertisements in union publications.

In 2010, Universal Studios purchased 2 tickets for the annual Art Directors Guild Excellence in Production Design Awards. The Art Directors Guild & Scenic, Title, and Graphic Artists (IATSE 800) organizes this annual event to honor production designers for outstanding contributions in the previous year. IATSE Local 800 requires that payment for tables at the ceremony be made directly to the union. It is customary in the motion picture industry for studios to purchase tickets for such award ceremonies. NBC Universal purchased advertising space in Perspective Magazine on seven occasions in 2010. Perspective Magazine is published by IATSE 800 and payments made for advertising are made directly to the union. It is customary in the entertainment industry for media companies to place advertisements in union publications.

In 2010, Universal Studios purchased four tables for the 47th Annual ICG Publicists Awards luncheon. The Intenrational Cinematographers Guild (IATSE Local 600) organizes this annual event to honor publicists who have performed with distinction in the previous year. IATSE Local 600 requires that payment for tables at the ceremony be made directly to the union. It is customary in the motion picture industry for studios to purchase tables for motion picture award ceremonies.
11.c. Kind of each payment or expenditur: 4 tables at ICG Publicists Awards Luncheon
Golden Globe Post Party - 2 tickets
12. Explain fully the circumstances of a: Motion picture studios customarily host receptions celebrating award nominations and wins for their films. Those involved in the production of a particular film, in addition to other industry professionals, are typically invited to such events. Taylor Hackford was invited to a Golden Globe post party. Accordng to Universal Studio records, Mr. Hackford expressed his intent to attend, but at this time the Company cannot confirm his attendance at this event.

Motion picture studios customarily host receptions celebrating the release of new films. Those involved in the production of a particular film, in addition to other industry professionals, are typically invited to such events. Michael Mann was invited to a reception in honor of the Universal Studios film "The Wolfman. According to Universal Studios records, Mr. Mann expressed his intent to attend, but at this time the Company cannot confirm his attendance at the event.

12. Explain fully the circumstances of a: NBCU maintains a program called "Ovation, which is designed to recognize employees' outstanding contributions. to earn "Ovation" awards, emppoyees must have achieved one or more of a variety of objectives, including, but not limited to above and beyond effort, cost containment, excellence, imagination, initiative, innovation, leadership, outstanding teamwork, quality, and safety. Managers can nominate employees for "Ovation" awards in select denominations starting at $50, with larger awards available in proportion to employee contribution. Employees are eligible for consideration for an "Ovation" award whether or not they are represented by a union. Mr. Dabrowski received three "Ovation" awards for his work-related contributions.

Name: Eric
11.c. Kind of each payment or expenditur: "Ovation" Award "Ovation" Award

Explain fully the circumstances of a: NBCU maintains a program called "Ovation, which is designed to recognize employees' outstanding contributions. to earn "Ovation" awards, emlpoyees must have achieved one or more of a variety of objectives, including, but not limited to above and beyond effort, cost containment, excellence, imagination, initiative, innovation, leadership, outstanding teamwork, quality, and safety. Managers can nominate employees for "Ovation" awards in select denominations starting at $50, with larger awards available in proportion to employee contribution.
